title: You 2.0: Empathy Gym
description: Some people are good at putting themselves in another person's shoes. Others may struggle to relate. But psychologist Jamil Zaki argues that empathy isn't a fixed trait. This week, in our final installment of You 2.0, we revisit a favorite episode about how to exercise our empathy muscles.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
